price: Je! Wanadhani ya kuwa kwa vile tunavyo wapa mali na watoto
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ
footnotes: Hivyo hawa maasi wanadhani ya kwamba pale Sisi tunapo wawacha wakistarehe na mali na watoto tulio wapa

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
